select t.contract_id as contractId,contract_name as contractName,party_a as partyA,a.company_name as companyNameA, contract_no_a as contractNoA,party_b as partyB,b.company_name as companyNameB,contract_no_b as contractNoB, contract_status as contractStatus,contract_money as contractMoney,sign_in_time as signInTime,remind_period_type as remindPeriodType, remind_period as remindPeriod,contract_type as contractType,t.remark,t.tender_id as tenderId,d.dict_code_name as contractTypeName, ti.prj_name as prjName,allReturnMoney,CONCAT(round((allReturnMoney/contract_money)*100,2),'%') as returnMoneyPercent, ifnull(t.file_rel_id,'') as fileRelId,ifnull(t.elec_file_rel,'') as elecFileRel,t.over_time as overTime, allInvociMoney,CONCAT(round((allInvociMoney/contract_money)*100,2),'%') as invociMoneyPercent, length(CONCAT(t.file_rel_id,elec_file_rel))-length(replace(CONCAT(t.file_rel_id,elec_file_rel),',','')) as fileCount from tx_contract_info t left join tx_company_info a on t.party_a = a.company_Id left join tx_company_info b on t.party_b = b.company_Id left join tx_tender_info ti on t.tender_id = ti.tender_id left join tx_dict d on t.contract_type = d.dict_id and d.dict_code ='CONTRACTTYPE' left join (SELECT contract_id,sum(back_money) as allReturnMoney from tx_money_back GROUP BY contract_id) c on t.contract_id = c.contract_id left join (select contract_id,sum(total_money) as allInvociMoney from tx_invoci_info group by contract_id) i on i.contract_id = t.contract_id
and t.contract_id = #{ContractInfo.contractId}
and contract_name like CONCAT('%',#{ContractInfo.contractName},'%')
and contract_type = #{ContractInfo.contractType}
and a.company_name like CONCAT('%',#{ContractInfo.partyA},'%')
and b.company_name like CONCAT('%',#{ContractInfo.partyB},'%')
and contract_status like CONCAT('%',#{ContractInfo.contractStatus},'%')
and contract_no_a like CONCAT('%',#{ContractInfo.contractNoA},'%')
and contract_no_b like CONCAT('%',#{ContractInfo.contractNoB},'%')
order by t.create_time desc
